title: 325btc
author: 325btc
content: People who know about economy and finances knows that 2022 is same like 1929 its funny.Funny is that just b4 crash they pump up everything just like they did 1929 It s like movie titanic and great gatsby When there is total chaos then always free drinks at bar and music will play and nobody dont look for exit.The covid 19 2021 was like a titanic hit iceberg and 2022 a.k.a 1929 is like titanic sinking.Its funny becouse even the older generation been through all of this why they dont teach nothing to their kids ?The younger generation will go same things and nobody did not learn nothing about history.Its funny to see after people complain but they not even interested about how the things are working.And even third time can be same scheme becouse older generation dont teach younger generation

comments.author: Republikcoin.com
comments.body: Quote from: 325btc on July 29, 2022, 07:57:24 AMPeople who know about economy and finances knows that 2022 is same like 1929 its funny.I don't understand by 1929 you mean that and this also makes me very funny.QuoteIts funny becouse even the older generation been through all of this why they dont teach nothing to their kids ?The younger generation will go same things and nobody did not learn nothing about history.I already have plans to teach my children when they grow up because for now they are both very young and still in elementary school stage so it is still not feasible to teach them about many things that they may not need.QuoteIts funny to see after people complain but they not even interested about how the things are working.I don't think there's anything funny about anything now because there will be regeneration and everyone will surely teach their children to work better and more simply. So I don't see any cuteness in anything now.QuoteAnd even third time can be same scheme becouse older generation dont teach younger generation Do you already have an idea to teach the younger generation from now on? if so, where did you start to teach the younger generation?

comments.author: be.open
comments.body: Quote from: Republikcoin.com on July 29, 2022, 08:13:16 AMQuote from: 325btc on July 29, 2022, 07:57:24 AMPeople who know about economy and finances knows that 2022 is same like 1929 its funny.I don't understand by 1929 you mean that and this also makes me very funny.It is obvious that the Great Depression, and some parallels can indeed be traced. But the world has changed a lot in the last hundred years and I would not directly call the current situation the Great Depression Two.

comments.author: Yaunfitda
comments.body: Quote from: be.open on July 29, 2022, 08:33:44 AMQuote from: Republikcoin.com on July 29, 2022, 08:13:16 AMQuote from: 325btc on July 29, 2022, 07:57:24 AMPeople who know about economy and finances knows that 2022 is same like 1929 its funny.I don't understand by 1929 you mean that and this also makes me very funny.It is obvious that the Great Depression, and some parallels can indeed be traced. But the world has changed a lot in the last hundred years and I would not directly call the current situation the Great Depression Two.I agree, there's no put of comparison, the Great Depression what very different from what we are seeing right now. It all started with the fall of stocks and then bank runs.In any case, there are lessons to learn that time, that can be applicable to the current situation that we are in. Recession, the war, sinking economy. Nevertheless, as our grand fathers survived during that time, and so we are in 2022 up to the next 10 years.

comments.author: PrivacyG
comments.body: Quote from: 325btc on July 29, 2022, 07:57:24 AMIts funny becouse even the older generation been through all of this why they dont teach nothing to their kids ?The younger generation will go same things and nobody did not learn nothing about history.Why are you blaming the older generations when this should have in fact been taught in school?  You never get to learn the basic stuff about economics and savings.  You never get to learn about being independent.  You are taught anything but the most important aspects of life.  That one, they leave it up to you to find out, learn and fix by yourself along the years.I personally say it is the education to blame.  What you are and are not being taught in school.  Most students graduate believing in Fiat, Banks and all the BS our government wants us to believe in.-Regards,PrivacyG
